hypertrophy_recommendation.description: Muscle growth focus - moderate weight, higher volume

strength_recommendation.description: Maximum strength focus - heavy weight, low reps

power_recommendation.description: Explosive power focus - light to moderate weight, fast movement

hypertrophy.title: Hypertrophy Training (Muscle Growth)
hypertrophy.research_note: Based on Schoenfeld et al. (2017) meta-analysis showing optimal hypertrophy occurs at 6-20 reps with 65-85% 1RM

strength.title: Strength Training (Max Effort)
strength.research_note: Based on Helms et al. (2018) recommendations for strength development at >85% 1RM

power.title: Power Training (Speed-Strength)
power.research_note: Based on Cormie et al. (2011) showing optimal power development at 30-60% 1RM with maximal intent
